sources.title: Porky's Pooch (1941)
sources.description: Porky’s Pooch is a 1941 Warner Bros. Looney Tunes cartoon directed by Bob Clampett. The short was released on December 27, 1941, and stars Porky Pig. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/porkys-pooch-1941/

sources.title: Porky's Pooch (1941)
sources.description: Porky Pig's dog, Rover, tells the story of how he got the reluctant Porky to adopt him.

metadata.Plot: A dog named Rover explains to a black, down-on-his-luck shaggy dog named Andy how he got his master. He went into a hotel room and bothered someone taking a bath--Porky Pig. Porky doesn't want Rover as a pet, no matter how many times Rover tries to make Porky adopt him.
